name: Galactic Sword
description: Forged in a dying star, this blade radiates cosmic energy capable of slicing through dimensions.

name: Stellar Shield
description: A shield crafted from asteroid metal, designed to absorb celestial impacts and repel dark matter.

name: Nebula Armor
description: Armor infused with nebula gas clouds, granting stealth and resilience in zero-g battles.

name: Photon Blaster
description: Energy weapon firing concentrated photon beams. Ideal for close-range skirmishes.

name: Quantum Boots
description: Enables short-range quantum jumps, allowing teleportation in battle.

name: Cryo Grenade
description: Releases freezing mist capable of immobilizing enemies in solid ice.

name: Dark Matter Core
description: A mysterious core rumored to power ancient spacecrafts.

name: Holo Visor
description: Projects a real-time holographic HUD with mission data overlays.

name: Meteorite Ring
description: Forged from a meteorite, grants slight control over gravitational fields.

name: Solar Flare Gauntlet
description: Channels raw solar energy, unleashing plasma bursts.

name: Plasma Katana
description: A katana enveloped in plasma, cutting through metal effortlessly.

name: Wormhole Generator
description: Generates temporary wormholes for interstellar travel.

name: Ion Disruptor
description: Emits ionic waves to disable enemy electronics and shields.

name: Starforged Helmet
description: Forged from star remnants, enhances vision and protects against flares.

name: Warp Stabilizer
description: Stabilizes warp drives, reducing anomalies during hyperspace jumps.

name: EMP Mine
description: Deployable mine that emits an EMP blast disabling machinery.

name: Astro Cloak
description: Cloak that bends light and heat signatures for near-invisibility.

name: Cosmic Compass
description: A compass attuned to stellar magnetic fields, guiding explorers.

name: Nano Swarm Canister
description: Releases a nanobot swarm for repairs, sabotage, or scouting.

name: Graviton Boots
description: Lets wearer control gravity, enabling wall-walking and super jumps.
